content: Return to the Ashen Pass III Keeper's Shrine, and continue on the path opposite it. You'll reach a portion of the path where it narrows, and there's a Searing-Fire enemy to the right. However, the bigger problem you'll have is the spiked golden ball you can see straight up ahead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Return to the Ashen Pass III Keeper's Shrine, and continue on the path opposite it. You'll reach a portion of the path where it narrows, and there's a Searing-Fire enemy to the right. However, the bigger problem you'll have is the spiked golden ball you can see straight up ahead.
